unsaved_changes_dialog.title: Unsaved Changes
unsaved_changes_dialog.content: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save before closing?

import_dialog.title: Import Settings
import_dialog.content: This will replace all your current settings. Are you sure?

reset_dialog.title: Reset Settings
reset_dialog.content: This will reset all settings to their default values. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure?

providers.title: Providers
providers.description: Configure AI model providers and API keys
providers.no_models: No models available. Please fetch models first.
providers.base_url_hint: Leave empty to use the default {{name}} API endpoint
providers.models_showing: Showing {{enabled}} of {{total}} models (enabled models shown first)
providers.no_models_hint: Use Fetch to load from API or add manually below
providers.add_model_manually: Add models manually or use Fetch to load from API
providers.fetch_not_supported: {{name}} does not support dynamic model fetching. Add models manually.
providers.fetch_failed: Failed to fetch models. Please check your API key and network connection.

general.title: General
general.tool_model_desc: Model used for automated tasks like thread title generation
general.auto_start_desc: Automatically start the app when you log in
general.start_minimized_desc: Launch the app in the system tray
general.minimize_to_tray_desc: Hide window to system tray when minimized
general.close_to_tray_desc: Keep app running in system tray when closed

chat.title: Chat
chat.temperature_desc: Controls randomness in responses (0 = focused, 2 = creative)
chat.max_tokens_desc: Maximum length of generated response (auto-capped by model limit)
chat.streaming_desc: Display responses as they are generated
chat.markdown_rendering_desc: Render formatted text and code blocks
chat.sound_effects_desc: Play sounds for notifications and events
chat.auto_save_history_desc: Disable to prevent saving chat history (privacy mode)
chat.history_retention_days_desc: Tasks older than this will be automatically deleted

agent.title: Agent
agent.description: Configure AI agents and MCP tools for task execution
agent.browser_agent_behavior: The Browser Agent can interact with web pages, click elements, fill forms, and extract information from websites.
agent.file_agent_behavior: The File Agent can read, write, create, and manage files on your system.

browser_behaviors.analyze: Analyze webpages by taking screenshots and page element structures
browser_behaviors.commands: Use structured commands to interact with the browser
browser_behaviors.popups: Handle popups/cookies by accepting or closing them
browser_behaviors.user_help: Request user help for login, verification codes, payments
browser_behaviors.scroll: Use scroll to find elements, extract content with extract_page_content

file_behaviors.tasks: Handle file-related tasks: creating, finding, reading, modifying files
file_behaviors.paths: Always include working directory when outputting file paths
file_behaviors.naming: Output file names must be in English
file_behaviors.visualization: For data content, combine with visualization tools for display
file_behaviors.charts: Generate charts first before page generation to minimize work

agent.custom_prompt_placeholder: Enter custom instructions for this agent (optional)
agent.custom_prompt_desc_browser: Add custom instructions to extend the Browser Agent's capabilities
agent.custom_prompt_desc_file: Add custom instructions to extend the File Agent's capabilities
agent.mcp_tools_desc: Enable or disable MCP tools available to the AI agent. Changes are saved automatically.

mcp_tools_empty.title: No MCP Tools Available
mcp_tools_empty.desc: MCP tools will appear here when configured

scheduled_tasks.title: Scheduled Tasks
scheduled_tasks.description: Manage automated tasks that run on a schedule
scheduled_tasks.no_tasks_desc: Get started by creating your first automated task
scheduled_tasks.delete_confirm_content: Are you sure you want to delete this task?

ui.title: User Interface
ui.description: Customize the look and feel of the application
ui.font_size_desc: Adjust text size throughout the application
ui.show_line_numbers_desc: Display line numbers in code preview

network.title: Network
network.description: Configure proxy, timeout, retry, and User-Agent settings
network.enable_proxy_desc: Route requests through a proxy server
network.request_timeout_desc: Maximum time to wait for AI's first response
network.stream_timeout_desc: Maximum interval between tokens during streaming
network.retry_attempts_desc: Number of automatic retries when requests fail (0-10)
network.test_proxy_warning: Please configure proxy server and port first
